title: Revit Families Modeler
job_overview:
Job description
RD Studio is looking for an experienced and talented Revit Families Modeler.
RD Studio is a creative studio that creates high-quality Revit Families, Dynamo Scripts, and Revit Plugins focusing on innovation and functionality.

The job is entirely remote.

This role is a unique opportunity for a Revit Families Modeler looking to push the boundaries of architectural modeling and contribute to various high-profile projects. Join RD Studio and be part of a team that values expertise, creativity, and precision in BIM modeling.

Requirements:

Proven experience in modeling Parametric Revit Families
Experience in creating complex Revit Families, using formulas and nested Families
A robust portfolio showcasing a range of Revit Family models, including complex and challenging geometries.
Practical experience with companies' BIM standards and protocols.
